title: Africa awakens modern Nigeria
creator_credit: Atlantis Productions and J. Michael Hagopian
brief_description: Presents Nigeria, the most populated country in Africa progressing in the use of modern techniques and self-government. Stresses the influences of climate and geography on the economy, urbanization and education. Shows how the country has developed from a rich and ancient civilization, to becoming an independent nation.
